Checklist

Equations

Add alt text so that all students will be able to read and understand your equations.

  • Microsoft Powerpoint

Microsoft PowerPoint

This workflow includes the following task: alt text.

1. Adding Alt Text for Math

Ensures that the equation(s) contain text descriptions that can be read by a screen reader to help visually impaired students.

Step 1: Click the border of the equation so there is a solid outline, right click the border, press "Edit Alt Text".



Step 2: Type out a written explanation of the equation so that a screen reader can read it out to students.
